data.name: First Day - Old players bonus
data.detailed_description: Bonus for old players! Set "Pathfinder" (armor & weapon), and the game location for the easy farm "Dump"!
data.about_the_game: Bonus for old players! Set "Pathfinder" (armor & weapon), and the game location for the easy farm "Dump"!
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • OS: Linux OS

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
